Package DictionaryTypes

Class TrieDictionary

java.lang.Object
DictionaryTypes.abstractClasses.Dictionary
DictionaryTypes.TrieDictionary
All Implemented Interfaces:
DictionaryInterface
public class TrieDictionary
extends Dictionary
implements DictionaryInterface
This class creates the trie data structure and implements DictionaryInterface

  • Constructor Details

    • TrieDictionary

      public TrieDictionary()

  • Method Details

    • BFS

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> BFS()
      Returns array list of characters This method traverses the trie data structure in a breadth first manner. It will add nodes to a queue and subsequently add characters in an array list in the correct order.

    • DFS

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> DFS()
      Returns array list of characters This method traverses the trie data structure in a depth first manner. It fetches an array list of outgoing edges states and bubble sorts the words. The outgoing characters are also bubble sorted and then added to the array list.

    • removeWord

      public void removeWord​(java.lang.String word1)
      Removes word from Trie Dictionary This method searches array list of outgoing edges if word found inside the arraylist of edges and the accept state is true then the words accept state is changed to false.
      Specified by:
      removeWord in interface DictionaryInterface
      Parameters:
      word1 - word to be removed

    • CreateDictionary

      public void CreateDictionary​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Creates Dictionary for Trie Structure A root state is created and words are read one by one from input file. States are created for every character and concatenate on one another until the full word is formed. When the full word is created the boolean state is changed to accept.
      Specified by:
      CreateDictionary in interface DictionaryInterface
      Parameters:
      filePath - file path of input file

    • isWord

      public boolean isWord​(java.lang.String word)
      Method to validate whether word is in Trie dictionary structure. Searches through states and if full word is found and its boolean state is true, returns true.
      Specified by:
      isWord in interface DictionaryInterface
      Parameters:
      word - word the be validated

    • addNewWord

      public void addNewWord​(java.lang.String w)
      Method to add new word to Trie dictionary structure. Creates new states for every character and concatenates these characters onto one another until full word is formed and then then changes the accept state to true.
      Specified by:
      addNewWord in interface DictionaryInterface
      Parameters:
      w - is the word to be added

    • getDictionaryWords

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDictionaryWords()
      Returns an array list of words in Trie dictionary structure. It searches through the arraylist of outgoing edges which contain all the states. When an accept state is found the word is added to a new arraylist.
      Specified by:
      getDictionaryWords in interface DictionaryInterface

    • getNumberOfElements

      public int getNumberOfElements()
      Returns the number of words contained in the Trie dictionary structure. It searches states through the arraylist of outgoing edges. If a state is an accept state, a counter is increased.
      Specified by:
      getNumberOfElements in interface DictionaryInterface

    • findCommonPrefix

      public java.lang.String findCommonPrefix​(java.lang.String word)
      Returns a common prefix of a given word with one in the Trie dictionary. It searches states and returns the state that has the longest common prefix.
      Parameters:
      word - , is the word to compare prefixes with
